channel.title: Training magic
channel.description: I am currently on the server n00bascape and when i cast windstrike on an npc it doesnt give me mage xp.. why? and if its not suppose to then how do i train magic?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 15, 2006, 08:45:57 PM[/size][hr]also it wont let me eat

item.title: Training magic
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Uhm, I see your problem, it is probably a blank cheez source the best way to train magic is probably teleporting i’d say probly varrock then trollheim teleport and you can only eat if you’re weilding a weapon in the weapon slot.

Read full topic
